video_description:
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B005N130Y4/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=amazon13-20 - We have a Samsung Galaxy Tab in and wanted to give you guys a look at the first major competitor to the iPad. The Galaxy Tab is a 7-inch Android tablet available from Verizon, Sprint, T-Mobile, and soon AT&T.

Be sure to catch more of our videos by subscribing, or checking us out at http://video.gearlive.com.

You can also find us on Twitter - http://twitter.com/GearLive - and Facebook - http://facebook.com/GearLive
